PROVISIONS RELATING TO THE FEDERAL EMPLOYEES' RETIREMENT SYSTEM. The text discusses amendments related to administrative law judges' retirement benefits under the Federal Employees' Retirement System. It includes provisions for immediate and early retirement eligibility based on years of service and age requirements.
